org.apache.kafka.common

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlterConfigPolicy, ConsumerInterceptor<K,V>, CreateTopicPolicy, DeserializationExceptionHandler, Partitioner, PrincipalBuilder, ProducerInterceptor<K,V>, Transformation<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPrincipalBuilder, LogAndContinueExceptionHandler, LogAndFailExceptionHandler

    public interface Configurable
    A Mix-in style interface for classes that are instantiated by reflection and need to take configuration parameters

      Configure this class with the given key-value pairs
